programme.sub-title: A Sacerdotisa Azul e a Sacerdotisa Vermelha que Bloqueiam o Caminho

programme.title: Tsubaki é uma sacerdotisa que foi considerada a par com Kikyo. Ela estava com raiva porque a Jóia não lhe foi confiada, então se tornou uma sacerdotisa sombria.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Karon, O Demônio Gigante da Torre

programme.title: Uma noite, alguém possui Sango para atacar Mirok. O grupo examina um youkai que eles suspeitam estar por trás disso, mas estão enganados. Mirok é possuído em seguida e ataca Sango. Shippo tenta fugir, mas é encurralado por uma pequena sombra.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Há uma fenda na barreira de Narak. Mas é o começo do mês, e quando a noite cai, Inuyasha perde seus poderes, e a busca por Narak é adiada.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Barreira de Narak; A Decisão de Kagura

programme.title: Kagura se aproxima de Sesshomaru e diz a ele para matar Narak, mas Sesshoumaru se recusa. Enquanto Inuyasha e os outros procuram por Kagura, eles percebem que Narak é um meio-youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Shippo recebe uma carta desafiando-o para uma batalha. O remetente da carta é Soten Raijyu, e ele ainda é apenas uma criança. Ele investigou Inuyasha e os outros e determinou que eles eram muito fortes, então ele focou sua atenção em Shippo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Um youkai nascido de um pedaço de carne que Narak descartou se transforma em um homem sem rosto e rouba o rosto bonito de Muso, um monge viajante.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Muso ataca Agome e Inuyasha o destrói com sua Ferida do Vento. Narak, que estava assistindo ao evento, diz a Kagura para contar a Inuyasha onde Muso foi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Muso se regenera e Miroku diz a Inuyasha que o coração do youkai fica na cicatriz em forma de aranha. Kagura interfere e os insetos tiram o fragmento de Muso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Batalha de Três até a Morte

programme.title: Inuyasha visita Totosai em busca de uma técnica que pode romper a barreira de Narak. Lá ele conhece Bunza. Os dois fazem como Totosai os ordena. Bunza age como se fosse o discípulo mais velho, mas acaba entrando em colapso.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Miuga entrega uma mensagem para Totosai. Ele diz que a Tessaiga ficará mais forte se cortar derrotar um poderoso youkai. O grupo procura então os youkais morcegos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Mãe e os Sentimentos de Shiori

programme.title: O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a mãe de Shiori. Inuyasha é bloqueado pela barreira da menina e não consegue derrotá-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira

programme.title: A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo é obter os fragmentos da Jóia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande cão youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Conspiração dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo

programme.title: Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caíram sob um feitiço, e Agome está presa em uma prisão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos são Sesshomaru e Inuyasha

programme.title: O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, começa a se mover com o poder da Jóia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a múmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos

programme.title: Sango é convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrás. Kuranosuke tem aparência, status e riqueza. Sango está confusa sobre como ela recusará sua proposta de casamento.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: A Tessaiga está equipada com uma técnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roubá-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga

programme.title: Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolverá Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai até o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presença da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin

programme.title: Narak está tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak vê que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela está ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango está preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Conexão Entre o Presente e a Época das Guerras

programme.title: Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que é sua noiva. Mas Kuga é loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrás dele e é atacada por um youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa

programme.title: Ayame leva Kuga para parar a luta de seus companheiros. Mas ela não tem intenção de retornar para ele. O youkai que estava atrás dos fragmentos da Jóia ataca. Kuga luta para proteger Agome e Ayame.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: A Proposta de Casamento Super Veloz

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo conhecem uma senhora que é uma falsa exorcista. A fim de descobrir por que tantos youkais apareceram recentemente, eles vão ao Castelo que parece ser a origem desse problema.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: O Aumento da Energia Maligna; A Cabeça do Demônio

programme.title: Inuyasha luta contra o senhor do Castelo. Sango ouve que Mirok foi para o porão com a princesa e vai atrás dele. Agome encontra o cadáver da verdadeira princesa no quarto do lorde.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Enquanto procura por Narak, Kikyo conhece Kansuke, um velho bandido que está gravemente doente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo aceitam um trabalho para se livrar dos macacos, que estão destruindo campos. Eles encontram três macacos, Gon, Bun e Ken.
programme.desc: Inuyasha
programme.sub-title: Os Três Youkais do Deus Macaco

programme.title: Ao perceber que foi enganado, Bucciarati decide derrotar seu chefe traidor e salvar Trish, mas o Emperor Crimson tem a vantagem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Considerados traidores da Passione, os membros da equipe de Bucciarati precisam decidir o que fazer, mas não será fácil fugir do chefe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Squalo deixa Giorno fora de combate. Narancia usa a habilidade de radar de seu Stand Aerosmith para localizar e destruir a ameaça que se aproxima.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para investigar o passado do chefe, Bucciarati e sua equipe embarcam para a Sardenha, mas um estranho usuário de Stand aparece antes da decolagem.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Sozinha na cabine e sob ataque, Trish recebe a ajuda repentina de uma entidade que se autodenomina Spicy Lady, seu próprio Stand.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma missão para localizar Trish na Sardenha a pedido do chefe, o leal subordinado Doppio encontra o traidor Risotto.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Uma historinha do passado – "Meu Nome é Doppio"

programme.title: Ao perceber que Doppio é mais do que um simples membro de Passione, Risotto o ataca sistematicamente com a habilidade magnética de seu Stand, Metallic.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Decidido a identificar seu chefe, Abbacchio ativa seu Stand para revelar quem fotografou a mãe de Trish 15 anos antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: Sob um céu que pode desabar a qualquer momento

programme.title: Depois de receber uma informação anônima sobre a identidade do chefe e como derrotá-lo, Bucciarati e sua equipe vão a Roma encontrar a pessoa que fez a ligação.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para fugir do Stand carnívoro de Cioccolata, Green Tea, Bucciarati e Mista tentam arrumar um carro, mas Secco está determinado a impedir a fuga.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Cioccolata tenta eliminar civis inocentes com seu Stand usando um helicóptero, mas Giorno e Mista decidem derrubá-lo antes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Para impedir que Secco chegue ao Coliseu antes, Bucciarati o atrai para um duelo sob as ruas de Roma.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ferido demais para perceber quem o está ajudando, Bucciarati é levado ao Coliseu por Doppio, que revela sua verdadeira identidade à pessoa que o está esperando.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Emperor Crimson é disparado contra Polnareff, o Silver Chariot é perfurado pela flecha. Quem está dentro do Coliseu adormece de forma misteriosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Giorno evolui para Golden Wind Requiem. Diavolo tenta anular seus ataques, mas uma nova e terrível realidade aguarda o chefe da máfia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo enfrenta Dio após dar o antídoto ao pai. Durante a batalha, Dio decide usar a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo reencontra seu primeiro amor, Erina. Um homem chamado Will A. Zeppeli demonstra ter um estranho poder e diz que JoJo precisa destruir a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e seus companheiros são emboscados por Dio e uma horda de zumbis depois de serem atraídos até um cemitério por um garoto chamado Poco.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O lendário cavaleiro Blueford ressuscita e confia sua espada a JoJo. Tarkus ataca JoJo com força avassaladora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrível. Em um último ato de coragem, ele usa as forças que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Fanfan La Tulipe, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: O habilidoso espadachim e mulherengo Fanfan La Tulipe é obrigado a se juntar ao exército do rei Luís XV pela trambiqueira Adeline La Franchise , que o convence dizendo que assim se casará com uma das filhas do rei.

programme.title: Em Busca da Carta Proibida, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Durante a Reforma, Klaas Voeten, um impressor de literatura proibida, é pego pela Inquisição por imprimir uma carta escrita por Martinho Lutero. Seu filho Falko é involuntariamente impelido a ajudar seu pai e a procurar a carta.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 2: O Segredo do Ooze, (1993, Action)
programme.desc: Tartarugas Ninja buscam novo lar nos esgotos de Nova York e enfrentam o Destruidor, que usa o Ooze para criar capangas. Com ajuda de April, Jordan e Keno, precisam detê-lo.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Children)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: Deus da guerra, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: Na dinastia Ming, onde o jovem general Qi Jiguang conquista uma importante vitória contra os piratas japoneses, comandando o exército chinês. Quando, quatro anos depois, sua nação é mais uma vez atacada, Qi se vê obrigado a retornar aos campos de batalha.

programme.title: Guardiões do Tempo, (2020, Children)
programme.desc: Uma menina tenta salvar seus pais adotivos, opondo-se às forças do mal no outro mundo de São Petersburgo.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: A Lenda do Mestre Chinês, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela é uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Legado do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Mantendo-se discreto depois de ter sido derrotado por Ip Man, Cheung Tin Chi mete-se em sarilhos depois de se envolver numa luta com um estrangeiro poderoso.

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: Cão de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: A Lenda do Mestre Chinês, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A história do filme é baseada em uma lenda chinesa e gira em torno de um jovem estudante (Raymond Lam) que se apaixona por uma bela mulher (Huang Shengyi), sem saber que ela é uma cobra branca que assumiu a forma humana.

programme.title: The Night of the Hunter, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum stars in an unforgettable role as a psychopathic preacher in the relentless pursuit of two children who have their dead father's stolen fortune hidden in a doll. Shelley Winters co-stars.

programme.title: Thunder Road, (1958, Action)
programme.desc: Lucas Doolin (Robert Mitchum) runs moonshine across the mountain back roads, dodging the law and the lawless alike. With government agents closing in on him, it seems the county may run dry--but Doolin slams the pedal to the metal for one last run.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A novice teacher faces a class of rowdy, undisciplined working-class punks in this classic film that reflected some of the problems and fears of teens in the 60s. Rating: Not Rated

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Lilies Of The Field, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Nominated for 5 Academy Awards® including Best Picture and winner of the Best Actor Oscar® for Sidney Poitier for his role as an itinerant handyman who stops to help five impoverished nuns and the small Arizona desert town in which they reside.

programme.title: The Defiant Ones, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: In Stanley Kramer's cinema classic, screen legends Sidney Poitier and Tony Curtis star as two convicts on the run from a Southern work gang who are bound together by an unbreakable iron chain and separated by an unbridled hatred for each other.

programme.title: Duel at Diablo, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Frontier scout Jess Remsberg leads a wagon train through hostile territory to Fort Conchos. But underneath his valor, he has an ulterior motive: to settle a score with the man he believes killed his wife. James Garner and Sidney Poitier star.

programme.title: The Best Years of Our Lives, (1946, War)
programme.desc: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

programme.title: The Train, (1964, War)
programme.desc: Screen greats Burt Lancaster, Paul Scofield and Jeanne Moreau star in this suspense-laden tale of justice and retribution as a French Resistance fighter (Lancaster) attempts to stop a Nazi commander from looting the art treasures of Paris.

programme.title: Braveheart, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: William Wallace, a commoner, unites the 13th Century Scots in their battle to overthrow English rule.

programme.title: Gladiator, (2000, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan, (1998, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: A World War II captain (Tom Hanks) and his squad (Edward Burns, Tom Sizemore) risk all to locate and send home a soldier whose three brothers died in combat.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan’s wife.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Scream 3, (2000, Horror)
programme.desc: The first film set the rules. In the sequel, the stakes got higher. In the third installment of the hit franchise SCREAM, all bets are off. It's an insidious game of horror movie mayhem with surprising twists and turns.

programme.title: Scream 4, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro – but it’s a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: Scream, (2022, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Twenty-five years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, a terrifying new killer resurrects the Ghostface mask.

programme.title: Scream VI, (2023, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: The four Woodsboro survivors have moved to New York City for a fresh start. Just as they begin to feel safe again, they receive that infamous call. Ghostface reemerges more brutal and relentless than ever, stopping at nothing to hunt them down.

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Horror)
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths, an offbeat group of scary movie fans become the target of a masked killer in this smash-hit thriller from legendary director Wes Craven (A NIGHTMARE ON ELM STREET) that breathed new life into the horror genre.

programme.title: Scream 2, (1997, Horror)
programme.desc: While away at college, Sidney Prescott thought she'd finally put the terror behind her...until a copycat killer begins acting out a real-life sequel in which no one is safe, or beyond suspicion.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Witness destiny unfold for Trish and the rest of Bruno’s team as her father’s cryptic presence and arcane abilities pull the crew into battles of unspeakable brutality.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: With Abbacchio’s replaying ability interminably stamped in stone, Bruno and team analyze the cryptic face and fingerprints left behind when a mysterious call arrives.
programme.sub-title: Get to the Collessium in Rome!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: No sooner than Bruno and team set foot on the shore near Rome the team finds a flesh-eating mold devouring everyone in sight. It's the work of Cioccolata, made worse by his partner Secco, who records the tortured faces of his victims to be viewed later.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: Branching off from Bruno, who opts to tackle the underground swimmer Secco, Giorno and Mista chase Cioccolata as he flies to spread rotten ruin upon Rome. Their battles unfold in front of a mystery ally silently awaiting their arrival at the Colosseum.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Platoon, (1986, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: The film probes the psyche of the young soldiers who fought in Vietnam. Their camaraderie, their struggle for survival amid terrifying violence and madness of combat.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.desc: A US West Coast teen lifestyle parody centered around Cher, a popular high school girl who spends her days playing match-maker, helping her friends with fashion choices, and looking for a boyfriend.

programme.title: Mean Girls, (2004, Screwball)
programme.desc: Cady thinks she understands "survival of the fittest." However, the law of the wild takes a whole new meaning when the homeschooled 15-year-old enters public high school for the first time.

programme.title: Mean Girls 2, (2011, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: The Plastics are back in the follow-up to the smash-hit Mean Girls... and now the clique is more fashionable, funny and ferocious than ever!

programme.title: Orange County, (2002, Screwball)
programme.desc: Shaun is content to be a bright but unfocused surf slacker, until the day he discovers a novel by acclaimed author Martin Skinner. Inspired, he suddenly leaves behind Orange County to study creative writing Stanford University.

programme.title: Nacho Libre, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jack Black is more hilarious than ever as Ignacio, a monastery cook who feeds orphan children by day and by night transforms himself into Nacho Libre, a notorious Luchador in stretchy pants.

programme.title: Black Sheep, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: Dedicated to helping his big brother Al (Tim Matheson) win the race for Washington State governor, he turns every opportunity for votes into an embarrassing disaster.

programme.title: Despite his injuries, Lee keeps on fighting desperately. But the tornado that envelopes Raiga’s attack takes the form of a dragon, and Lee is swallowed up by it.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto is chosen to lead Konohamaru, Moegi and Udon in a survival training exercise. Their destination is the Stone Face of Warudakumi at the top of Mt. Takurami…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tsunade orders Naruto, Hinata, Kiba and Akamaru on a mission to capture the thief Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others tend to an injured Sazanami. As Sazanami tells it, he had once been a swordsmith in a peaceful town and was framed for a murder committed by Gosunkugi.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While Guy and Lee are away, two impostors dressed like them sneak into Hidden Leaf Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Land of Birds is in turmoil due to a specter known as the Cursed Warrior, which is believed to be the ghost of Lord Owashi, the previous feudal lord who died suddenly.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Moso, the late feudal lord’s counselor, and Komei, the chief strategist, are at odds with each other. Neji begins to think that the Cursed Warrior is part of a plot…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Komei is controlling the Cursed Warrior. Moso thwarts Komei's ambitions. The Leaf team feels uneasy about his motives. Neji doesn't want to get involved, but Naruto is defiant. Gamakichi and Gamatatsu are summoned to investigate…
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Tenten and Neji have no choice but to listen to Kakashi. He senses that their being followed. Komei has been declared a criminal and is to be executed. The Cursed Warrior appears and snatches Komei away.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sagi swears to punish Moso himself. Naruto is reminded of Sasuke when he sees Sagi. Neither words nor Naruto's attempts to stop him can deter Sagi from his chosen path of revenge.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: At Moso's mansion, a battle takes place between the Wandering Ninja and a Leaf Ninja. With Chishima's help, Naruto is freed from Moso's genjutsu. Moso then reveals his true form as the leader of the Wandering ninja, Hoki!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Choji and Naruto are craving Ichiraku's special ramen only to find out that they find the shop closed! Teuchi reveals that his daughter has been kidnapped by Ryonin, aka the Ninja Chefs, who is after his secret recipes!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Demon of the Ocean is wreaking havoc in the Land of the Sea. Anko leads a team consisting of Naruto, Ino, and Shino. It turns out Anko has an unexpected history with the Land of the Sea.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Unable to find Naruto, Anko meets with officials from the Land of the Sea. The ship carrying government funds that they were supposed to guard sets sail the next day!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: As soon as she awakens, Anko begins to remember Demon Island, a place once visited with her former sensei, Orochimaru. Anko reveals the truth behind the disappearances and the secret behind Isaribi's body.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Amachi and his gang begin their attack on the government ship. Naruto and the others escape from Demon Island, but the sight that greets them is the Land of the Sea fleet on the verge of annihilation.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The Hidden Leaf ninja and Amachi battle it out at sea. With Naruto's help, Amachi is defeated, but then a monster appears. Naruto summons Gamabunta in order to defeat the monster.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Kunijiro visits Tsunade and decides to have Naruto guide his boy through one day in the life of a ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto, Kiba, and Hinata are searching for buried treasure at the request of Tsunade's friend Agari Kaisen. Thinking its an easy task since they have a map, Tsunade threatens to send them back to the Academy if they fail.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: After escaping from the cave, Naruto and the others chase after the Kedouin in order to put a halt to their plot, but the Village Hidden in the Leaves is already under attack.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto discovers Jiraiya is up to no good. Jiraiya claims to be busy getting his manuscript ready before his deadline. Impatient and irritated, Naruto writes his own manuscript for Jiraiya!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others investigate the whereabouts of the stolen star. The team suspects that is an inside job because the ninja who took the star used the ninja art, Kujaku, from the Star Village.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akahoshi, the masked ninja who kidnapped Sumaru, intends to use Sumaru to call out the mysterious ninja who stole the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: The masked ninja and Naruto fall into the depths of the Valley. While tending to Naruto's wounds, the masked ninja tells him the reason for stealing the star.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Natsuhi's body is reacting to the effects of the star. She wields the star and desperately confronts Akahoshi, but Sumaru is taken as hostage
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Sumaru senses his mother's death and Naruto is unable to stop an angry Sumaru from running off. To save Sumaru, Hokuto and Mizura stake their lives to reveal the truth behind the star training.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Akamaru is injured by a rival shinobi from another nation. The shinobi used a battle skill that spreads bacteria throughout the opponent's body, infecting the victim's mental faculties. This causes Akamaru to go into uncontrollable rampage!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: A mysterious being attaches itself to Naruto, while he was training in the forest. Tsunade begins to wonder if it isn't the legendary being known as the "Onbaa."
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and Shino are given a mission to provide security during the Kagetsu family funeral, but they soon realize that the real mission is to help the eldest son carry out the man's unusual last will and testament!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: An ominous black smoke appears over the Land of Greens, and all of sudden Choji and company are attacked by an unidentified Ninja!
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: While questioning Yurinoshin and Shun, the Hidden Leaf squad learns the truth about Shun's true identity.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Naruto and the others are attacked by Ruiga, the first evil ninja, who can draw water from the earth to use as weapons.
programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Get Shorty, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Golden Globe® winner John Travolta stars with Gene Hackman, Danny DeVito and Rene Russo in this wildly popular comedy of a gangster who turns into a big-time producer after he travels to Hollywood to collect a debt from a down-and-out filmmaker.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: 3000 Miles to Graceland, (2001, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Posing as Elvis impersonators, ex-convicts rob a Las Vegas casino during an Elvis Presley fan convention, but greed and dissention among them ultimately lead to betrayal and chaos.

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Sex. Money. Power. Drugs. Brace yourself for a true story from legendary filmmaker Martin Scorsese. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as a young stockbroker hungry for a life of non-stop thrills, where corruption was king and more was never enough.

programme.title: Pain & Gain, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: When an ambitious group of personal trainers go after the American Dream, they get caught up in a criminal enterprise that goes horribly wrong. Now, living large will take everything they've got in this unbelievable and outrageous true story.

programme.title: The Untouchables, (1987, Action)
programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: MAFIA, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: In the 1970s, a fierce crime boss (Ving Rhames) wreaks havoc on the streets. Detective Womack (Pam Grier) decides to put an end to this organized crime – even if it means breaking the law.

programme.title: Penelope, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: She's young, she's rich, she's available - too bad she has a pig's nose. Christina Ricci and James McAvoy team in a modern fairy tale about finding perfect love, imperfections and all.

programme.title: Adventureland, (2009, Screwball)
programme.desc: From the director of SUPERBAD comes a coming-of-age comedy of big dreams, hysterical consequences, and young love, set in a run-down amusement park.

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.title: In The Mood For Love, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

programme.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: A comedy-fantasy about a Depression-era movie fan/waitress whose day-to-day existence is enlivened when her latest idol walks right off the screen and into her life!

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.title: Stanford Prison Experiment, The, (2015, Drama)
programme.desc: Based on the infamous true story, 24 students role-play as prisoners & guards in an experiment that shocked the world. This chilling thriller stars Ezra Miller & Billy Crudup.

programme.title: Hot Summer Nights, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: An awkward teenager gets in over his head dealing drugs while falling for his business partner's enigmatic sister during one scorching summer in Cape Cod, Massachusetts.

programme.title: American Honey, (2016, Drama)
programme.desc: An adolescent girl from a troubled home runs away with a traveling sales crew who drive across the American Midwest selling subscriptions door to door.

programme.title: The First Wives Club, (1996, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Join the Club - The First Wives Club, the good-time battle-of-the-sexes satire sparked by snappy one-liners, great physical-comedy gags and three unforgettable stars in top form, Bette Midler, Goldie Hawn and Diane Keaton.

programme.title: Fools Rush In, (1997, Drama)
programme.desc: Matthew Perry stars as Alex Whitman, a New Yorker sent to Las Vegas to oversee a construction project. There he meets Isabel Fuentes, and some serious chemistry brings them together for one night. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder — and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.title: Shakespeare in Love, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: After providing inspiration to Will Shakespeare, his case of writer's block cured, and a taste for romance rekindled by the mysterious Lady Viola. Gwyneth Paltrow, Joseph Fiennes, Ben Affleck, and Dame Judi Dench star in this Best Picture winner.

programme.title: First Knight, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Together, Sean Connery, Richard Gere, Julia Ormond (Legends of the Fall, Sabrina) and Jerry Zucker, the director of Ghost, bring you a new vision of King Arthur's Camelot.

programme.title: Ghost, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Patrick Swayze plays a ghost who teams with a psychic (Whoopi Goldberg) to uncover the truth behind his murder — and to rescue his sweetheart (Demi Moore) from a similar fate.

programme.desc: When butcher Leo returns from a fishing trip, he can't wait to show off his prize catch: his beautiful new wife, a country clairvoyant named Marina. But he soon hears about a psychic who turns hardened city dwellers into lovestruck kids.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman he’s wanted all along!

programme.title: The End, (1978, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: When Sonny (Burt Reynolds) is diagnosed with a fatal disease, he swallows a bottle of pills to end it all! Instead, he ends up in a loony bin beside the demented Marlon (Dom DeLuise) who is eager to help Sonny succeed...one madcap attempt at a time!

programme.title: Starting Over, (1979, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds plays Phil Potter, a low-key, contented magazine writer who tries to put his life back together after his wife Jessica (Candice Bergen) opts for independence as a singer-songwriter.

programme.title: White Lightning, (1973, Action)
programme.desc: In one of his most memorable roles, Burt Reynolds portrays a moonshine whiskey runner who turns state's witness to avenge the murder of a boy no one understood.

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Gone In 60 Seconds, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Buckle-up as Eleanor, the fast and furious Ford Fastback Mustang, takes you on a full-throttle ride you'll never forget. The Assignment: To steal 48 muscle and exotic cars! The Challenge: Avoid getting caught!

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Hart of the Matter
programme.desc: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Change of Hart
programme.desc: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite’s brother Hart from Vetrix’s grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart’s safety hangs in the balance!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 1
programme.desc: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 2
programme.desc: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere of Fear: Part 3
programme.desc: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma’s duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix’s unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear – his soul, his Numbers and… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Countdown Begins
programme.desc: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker’s diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 1
programme.desc: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker’s fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 2
programme.desc: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: A Trio’s Challenge: Part 3
programme.desc: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World… and themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Kite’s Plight: Part 1
programme.desc: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma’s about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Kite’s Plight: Part 2
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma’s dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Attack of the Barians: Part 1
programme.desc: The Barian invasion begins! Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma’s Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Attack of the Barians: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma’s battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him… Astral?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Hard Knox
programme.desc: When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won’t soon forget!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rule Duel
programme.desc: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who’s been corrupted by the Barians!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Adventures of Artimus Stanleyus
programme.desc: Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel! Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Doom in Bloom
programme.desc: Shark’s sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Rivals in the Ring
programme.desc: A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma’s Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Friendship Games
programme.desc: When Yuma’s buddies can’t stop bickering, it’s time for them to face-off in the Friendship Games, a sports dueling competition with surprises around every corner… including Barians!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere Cube Calamity: Part 1
programme.desc: A dangerous new Barian enemy arrives, and he’s bringing one of his world’s most powerful weapons to take down Yuma and Astral!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Sphere Cube Calamity: Part 2
programme.desc: Mizar batters Yuma to his breaking point… until a surprise duelist steps in to take down Mizar and go claw-to-claw with his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Playing Defense
programme.desc: In order to set Yuma straight, Shark steals Yuma’s Key! Can Yuma find the courage to face Shark, or will Yuma’s fears leave him cowering for cover?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Counter Offensive: Part 1
programme.desc: Let’s get ready to duuuuuuuuel! Yuma steps into the ring with Alito, but can he dodge this Barian’s Battlin’ Boxers before they send him to the canvas for a ten count?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Counter Offensive: Part 2
programme.desc: It’s Round 2 of the heavyweight battle between Yuma and Alito! Can Yuma bob and weave his way around Alito’s attacks, or will this Barian’s fancy footwork finish him off for good?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Dual Duel: Part 1
programme.desc: Girag’s got revenge on his mind and Ray in his sights, but when Yuma steps in to save the day, the Ray Way steers Yuma off course!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Dual Duel: Part 2
programme.desc: Girag has Yuma and Ray in the palm of his hand, but will a secret that Ray has been keeping help our heroes escape the clutches of this Barian behemoth?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Darkness Dawns
programme.desc: Astral and Yuma face a challenge so daunting that they must turn to their biggest adversary for help!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: You Give Love A Bot Name
programme.desc: When Orbital 7 crashes into Lillybot, it’s love at first sensor! So when he discovers his beloved bot is in trouble, he motors to free her from her tormentor… Yuma!
programme.sub-title: You Give Love A Bot Name

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Take a Chance
programme.desc: Shark’s trying to control Rio’s life and she’s not taking it anymore! Will this family feud turn into a feeding frenzy for Shark, or will Rio put her brother’s winning streak on ice?!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: An Imperfect Couple: Part 1
programme.desc: The gang’s dressed up as their favorite monsters for the school’s fun fair, but when Anna crashes the festivities, the party ends for Yuma!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: An Imperfect Couple: Part 2
programme.desc: Being Anna’s boyfriend is a dangerous job, but when Anna’s teacher plays a Barian card, Yuma finds out just how dangerous it is!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: Enter Vector
programme.desc: Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL: The Search for Shadows
programme.desc: Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!

programme.title: The painful story of Ohara – and Robin’s younger years – draws to a tragic close. Luffy declares war on the World Government, and Robin finally changes her tune!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Say you want to live! We are your friends!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are ready to begin the fight for Robin, but first, Luffy flashes back to memories of his childhood – and the man who made him want to become a pirate!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Jump towards the falls! Luffy's feelings!

programme.title: Zoro remembers the first time he met Luffy, and Usopp recalls the events that led him to join the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The ways of men! Zoro's techniques, usopp's dream!

programme.title: Nami’s heartbreaking past – and Luffy’s epic battle with Arlong – are recalled in this flashback to the early days of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A bond of friendship woven by tears! Nami's world map!

programme.title: A flashback sheds light on how Sanji came to join the crew, and Chopper’s backstory is revealed through memories of a visit to a snow-covered island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Parting builds a man's character! Sanji and chopper!

programme.title: A flashback reveals Robin’s motives for cooperating with CP9, Nami’s shocking discovery about the archaeologist’s past, and Luffy’s determination to save his friend!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Everything is for her friends! Robin in the darkness!

programme.title: Franky stands up to Spandam by destroying what the madman desires most, and the sound of the sea train spurs the Straw Hats to make a daring leap of faith!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I'm not gonna hand over the blueprints! Franky's decision!

programme.title: Luffy races to rescue Robin while the rest of the Straw Hats set off in search of the five keys needed to unlock the archaeologist!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Obtain the five keys! The straw hat pirates vs. Cp9!

programme.title: While Usopp and Zoro go head-to-head with a couple of animal assassins, Sanji teaches the most beautiful member of CP9 the secrets of making good tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Devil fruit powers! Kaku and jabra transform!

programme.title: Luffy runs into trouble trying to sail his way to Robin, Usopp and Zoro end up handcuffed together, and Sanji’s inability to kick a women may lead to serious injury!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I won't kick even if it costs me my life! Sanji's chivalry!

programme.title: Chimney and Gombe show Luffy the secret passage that leads to Robin, and Franky puts on a display of raw punching power thanks to a few bottles of cola!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fukurou's miscalculation! My cola is the water of life!

programme.title: While Franky’s brawl spills into the ocean, Usopp and Sanji attempt to overcome their handcuffs by outsmarting their opponents!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro busts out a new technique! The sword's name is sniper king?

programme.title: Determined not to be defeated by the heinous hair of a devious lion, Chopper risks life and limb by summoning the power of his Rumble Ball for a third time!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Travel back to ancient Japan for a madcap adventure starring the Straw Hats, some old friends and enemies, and a camel that eats lottery tickets!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boss luffy returns! Is it a dream or reality? Lottery ruckus!

programme.title: The madcap throwback continues as Luffy and the gang – along with a crowd of characters from the Alabasta arc – competes for a priceless treasure hidden inside a tasty snack!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A big rice cake tossing race at the castle! Red nose's plot!

programme.title: Nami battles a bathing beauty and her lethal bubbles, Chopper unleashes his inner beast, and Luffy inches ever closer to catching up with Robin!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Bubble master kalifa! The soap trap closes in on nami!

programme.title: Franky has a painful encounter with monster Chopper, and Nami gets scrubbed too clean to fight! Meanwhile, Spandam accidentally invokes the deadly Buster Call!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Resounding bad news! Buster call invoked!

programme.title: Zoro uses Usopp as a decoy in his battle with the beasts, and Nami discovers the secret that could be the key to survival in her brawl with the bathing beauty!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Five namis? Nami strikes back with mirages!

programme.title: Franky and Nami come up with a plan to stop Chopper’s rampage, but it could prove deadly to the not-so-little reindeer. Usopp and Zoro are thrilled to finally be free of each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Nami's decision! Fire at the out-of-control chopper!

programme.title: Usopp’s ill-advised attempt at bravery threatens to get him killed, but a familiar foot spares the sniper’s life. Luffy struggles to even strike a formidable foe, and Franky races to deliver some very important keys!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Hunter sanji makes an entrance? Elegy for a lying wolf!

programme.title: Sanji evens the playing field in his CP9 slugfest by introducing his wolfish opponent to the burning power of the devil’s leg!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fiery kicks! Sanji's full course of foot techniques!

programme.title: Zoro finally lands a blow against the killer giraffe, but Luffy still can’t find a way to break through against Lucci! Can Frank reach Robin before it’s too late!?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fierce sword attacks! Zoro vs. Kaku, powerful sword fighting showdown!

programme.title: Zoro unleashes a demonic nine sword fighting style on his giraffe opponent, Luffy buys time for Franky by ascending to second gear, and Robin refuses to give up hope of being rescued!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Demon god zoro! An incarnation of asura born from fighting spirit!

programme.title: Spandam cruely drags Robin ever closer to the gates of justice, but the battle takes a turn for the better when the Sniper King makes a surprise appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Spandam frightened! The hero on the tower of law!

programme.title: Luffy’s battle with Lucci reveals the powerful secrets of the rubber man’s second gear, and the Spandam’s thoughtless Buster Call begins with a brutal barrage of cannonballs.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Robin freed! Luffy vs. Lucci, showdown between leaders!

programme.title: When an ancient tree is stolen by a madman with the power to freeze time, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji track down the culprit in an attempt to save a village’s annual festival!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Boss luffy is the culprit? Track down the missing great cherry tree!

programme.title: Nami, Sanji, Usopp, Zoro, and company find themselves trapped in a tunnel filled with rapidly rising water. Meanwhile, Luffy musters the strength for one last stand in his battle with Lucci.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I can't protect anyone unless i win! Third gear activated!

programme.title: Flashback to the dark past of Rob Lucci as the young boy learns to dispense a cold, cruel, and brutal brand of justice. Back in real time, Luffy’s battle with Lucci threatens to destroy the navy fleet.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Shivering past! Dark justice and rob lucci!

programme.title: Luffy’s gigantic attack on Lucci takes a devastating toll on his body, Robin rejoins the fight, and the rest of the Straw Hats struggle to survive underwater!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious mermaid appears? As consciousness fades away…

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from what appears to be a mermaid, the Straw Hats find themselves reunited aboard an escape vessel, but the fate of Luffy and the Franky Family is yet to be determined!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Cannon fire sinks the island! Franky's lamentation!

programme.title: Luffy pushes his body to the breaking point in his battle with Lucci, and the rest of the Straw Hats try to fight off a fleet of Marines until their captain returns – if he ever does.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Wait for luffy! Mortal combat on the bridge of hesitation!

programme.title: Luffy lies battered and badly beaten, but Usopp’s desperate pleas inspire the rubber-man to mount one final, furious attack on Rob Lucci!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists full of emotion! Luffy unleashes gatling with all his might!

programme.title: With their leader crippled by exhaustion and their escape ship destroyed, the Straw Hats find themselves with only one treacherous option: throwing themselves into the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: From the sea, a friend arrives! The straw hats share the strongest bond!

programme.title: Interstellar, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From director Christopher Nolan (Inception) comes the story of ex-pilot Cooper (Matthew McConaughey), who must leave his family and Earth behind to lead an expedition beyond this galaxy to discover whether mankind has a future among the stars.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Thriller)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Ghost In The Shell, (1995, Anime)
programme.desc: 2029 – A female government cyber agent and the Internal Bureau of Investigations are hot on the trail of a "The Puppet Master" – a computer virus capable of invading cybernetic brains and altering its victim’s memory.

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: John Carpenter's Escape From L.A., (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The man with the patch is back. Call him Snake. His job: wade through L.A.’s ruined landmarks to retrieve a doomsday device, with a wild assortment of friends, fiends and foes.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Little Big Man, (1970, Drama)
programme.desc: From director Arthur Penn (BONNIE AND CLYDE), Dustin Hoffman, Chief Dan George, Faye Dunaway, Martin Balsam, Jeff Corey and Richard Mulligan star in a genre-defying tale of an alleged 121-year-old white survivor of Custer's Last Stand.

programme.title: Pioneer Woman, (1973, Drama)
programme.desc: In this powerful tale of courage, determination, and the pioneering spirit that defined an era, a young woman bravely sets out with her children in tow to claim a homestead - and a brand new life - in the untamed West after her husband is killed.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Drama)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman (2014), (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Whirlwind, (1951, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry arrives in Red Bluff to work on the investigation of mail robberies. U.S. Bonds are stolen, and Smiley finds burned fragments of them. A henchman confesses who the guilty party is.

programme.title: Apache Country, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Cavalry scouts Gene Autry & Pat Buttram are ordered to break up a ring which uses raids to cover up its activities. Carolina Cotton assists Gene and Pat, while seeking revenge against the gang leader.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Across the Universe, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: A love story about a British boy and an American girl set against the backdrop of the social upheaval of the 1960s.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Stomp the Yard: Homecoming, (2010, Drama)
programme.desc: In the countdown to a national step-off, rivalries at Truth University run red-hot. The Theta Nus are counting on new pledge Chance Harris (Collins Pennie) to lead the team to victory. But he's too caught up in his own problems to focus. Rating: PG-13

programme.title: Down to Earth, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Struggling black comic Lance Barton (Chris Rock) knows what it's like to die on stage. But when his life takes an unexpected turn - straight to heaven - Lance is sure there's been a mistake.

programme.title: First Sunday, (2007, Comedy)
programme.desc: Two bumbling criminals discover they haven't got a prayer when they attempt to steal from the local church.

programme.title: O Anjo da Morte, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um policial disfarçado se aproxima de seu inimigo. Ela decide deixar um agente de confiança entrar em campo, mas tem dúvidas se ela tem o que é preciso para completar a missão. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Linha de Ação, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. O prefeito contrata um ex-policial para investigar quem é o amante de sua esposa. Apesar de suas antigas discordâncias, ele aceita a tarefa, mas logo descobre as reais intenções por trás da investigação encomendada. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Crowe, Mark, Russell, Walberg Diretor: Allen Hughes

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999)
programme.desc: 1999. Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrível criatura Grendel e a sua mãe que procura vingança. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Christopher Lambert, Rhona Mitra, Oliver Cotton, Götz Otto, Vincent Hammond, Charles Robinson, Brent Jefferson Lowe, Roger Sloman, Layla Roberts, Patr... Diretor: Graham Baker

programme.title: Guerra Biológica, (1998)
programme.desc: 1998. Um imunologista da CIA se aposenta e vai morar com sua filha numa cidadezinha distante. Quando um miliciano detona uma bomba biológica na região, cabe ao ex-agente evitar o pior e salvar as vidas de todos. Gêneros: Sci-Fi & Fantasy Elenco: Steven Seagal, Gailard Sartain, L.Q. Jones, Silas Weir Mitchell, Camilla Belle, Dan Beene, Damon Collazo, Whitney Yellow Robe, Brad Leland, Molly McClure Diretor: Dean Semler

programme.title: Caçada ao Presidente, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Após o avião em que estava ter sido abatido por terroristas, o presidente dos Estados Unidos está ferido e perdido no meio de uma zona rural finlandesa. E sua vida agora está nas mãos de Oskari um tímido jovem de treze anos de idade. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Samuel L. Jackson, Onni Tommila, Ray Stevenson Diretor: Jalmari Helander

programme.title: Evidências de um Crime, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. Após a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profissão para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaçando a vida estável que construiu para a família. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Samuel L. Jackson, Eva Mendes, Ed Harris, Robert Foster Diretor: Renny Harlin

programme.title: O Homem da Máfia, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Um assalto a um jogo de pôquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da máfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional é contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitação de alguns dos participantes coloca a situação fora de controle. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Brad, Liotta, Pitt, Ray Diretor: Andrew Dominik

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Quando o implacável Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmão mais velho de Miguel e que também trabalha para o bandido, está desesperado para manter o garoto seguro. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jean-Claude Van Damme, David Castañeda, Elijah Rodriguez, Nicholas Sean Johnny, Charlie MacGechan, Joana Metrass, Dean John-Wilson, Jim Caesar, Kerry Bennett, Uriel Emil Pollack Diretor: Lior Geller

programme.title: O Sequestro do Ônibus 657, (2015)
programme.desc: 2015. Um pai não tem meios para pagar o tratamento médico da filha. Como último recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas dão errado, eles são forçados a sequestrar um ônibus da cidade. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Robert De Niro, Jeffrey Dean Morgan, Kate Bosworth, Dave Bautista, Stephen Cyrus Sepher, Gina Carano, Morris Chestnut, Lydia Hull, Mark-Paul Gosselaar, D.B. Sweeney Diretor: Scott Mann

programme.title: Blitz, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Blitz é um serial killer de Londres que está matando policiais. O inspetor-chefe Roberts e o sargento Brant, um detetive de polícia duro, inflexível e politicamente incorreto, terão a tarefa de tentar deter o psicopata. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Paddy Considine, Aidan Gillen, David Riley Diretor: Elliott Lester, Jordan Hill

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras durões e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vão unir forças para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa não será nada fácil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gêneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

programme.title: Motoqueiro Fantasma: Espírito de Vingança, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Nove anos após se transformar no temido Motoqueiro Fantasma, Johnny Blaze se refugia para tentar controlar sua maldição e deixá-la escondida da maioria das pessoas. Ele leva uma vida solitária, até ser obrigado a entrar em ação novamente. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Cage, Elba, Idris, Nicolas Diretor: Mark Neveldine

programme.title: Ninja, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Scott Adkins – Tsuyoshi Ihara, Miki Hijii Diretor: Isaac Florentine

programme.title: Risco Absoluto, (2010)
programme.desc: 2010. Liberado após seis anos preso por um crime que não cometeu, Shane Danielsnão demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a máfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Steven Seagal Diretor: Keoni Waxman

programme.title: Perseguição Mortal, (2022)
programme.desc: 2022. O ladrão realiza o roubo de sua vida quando rouba o traficante psicótico, Temple. O plano corre bem até que o ladrão descobre um clandestino em seu carro de fuga: a esposa grávida de Temple, Mia. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Vinnie Jones, Lina Lecompte, James Clayton Diretor: James Clayton

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: Velocidade sem Limites, (2007)
programme.desc: 2007. Uma bela mulher, líder de uma banda de música, se vê envolvida em uma competição ilegal de corrida de carros realizada para entreter milionários entediados. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Angus Macfadyen, Nadia Bjorlin, Nathan Phillips Diretor: Andy Cheng

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: Caçado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam é um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vítimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caçadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, José Zúñiga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: B13-U 13º Distrito - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito estão retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma missão para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco líderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os serviços secretos da cidade tomem medidas drásticas para resolver o problema. programme.title: A Mulher Perfeita, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. A história de seis mulheres que vivem em um país onde muitas pessoas lutam para se converter naquilo que todos os homens desejam: a mulher perfeita. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: A Mulher Perfeita, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Eva e Nenê continuam brigando. Ele diz que, se ela for ao coquetel de Polanco, o casamento terminará. No entanto, Eva sai dizendo para ele amadurecer; Daniel conta sobre sua aventura com Carolina para Santiago. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: A Mulher Perfeita, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Nenê López interrompe a festa de Infinito procurando desesperadamente por sua mulher, e Cruz Mário fica furioso. Ele é levado por seguranças a um quarto, onde é ameaçado e espancado por Polanco. Gêneros: Entertainment
